item.description:
On Thursdays, a group of us gets together for breakfast and a hike. Sometimes we hike in Myles Standish. Sometimes we go on one of the AMC hikes. Sometimes we just eat breakfast when it's pouring.

This week--the AMC has rescheduled its planned hike in Bourne, so we are going to find a new way up Manomet Hill. 

Join us for breakfast at 8:30 or show up to Metro's by 9:30 before we leave to carpool or to park somewhere, as yet undetermined, along Old Sandwich Road in Plymouth.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday Hiking Club- Manomet Hill
